verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is the living God enduring forever,
And his Kingdom, shall not be destroyed â€“ HEY!
(repeat)
And His dominion, yes His dominion,
Shall be forever, forever;
And the King shall reign, yes Jesus shall reign in glory,
And the King shall reign, forevermore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Come into His presence and praise Him (repeat)
